title: Viral Wallpapers.
content:
Welcome to Viral Wallpapers! Our website offers a unique collection of abstract wallpapers inspired by computer viruses and malware. Our wallpapers feature repeating patterns of shapes that are sure to make your desktop stand out. 

Our wallpapers are set against a sleek black background, creating a bold and striking look. Whether you're looking for something edgy or just want to add some personality to your computer, our collection has something for everyone.

All of our wallpapers are available for free download in high resolution, so you can enjoy them on any device. We update our collection regularly, so be sure to check back often for new additions.

Join the viral trend and give your desktop a fresh new look with our abstract virus-inspired wallpapers!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
